riddle:
I’m a little calculation, can you see?
Add me to me, what will it be?
textSources: Introduction to basic math operations in coding

riddle:
Reverse my order, I plead to you.
What once was old becomes brand new!
textSources: How to reverse strings or numbers

riddle:
Look at my numbers, quite a few,
Tell me the sum—can you compute?
textSources: Using loops or functions to calculate sums

riddle:
I hold many words, one by one,
Find the longest—now you’re done!
textSources: Introduction to lists and finding elements
